profile.name: Yolanda
profile.title: Data Analyst Ecommerce . Data Scientist learner ( Python SQL R ) .  Connecting ideas with words
profile.description:
I am an **I.T. Technician** ( F.P. Desarrollo Aplicaciones Web ) with experience in database management and problem-solving. My Bachelor's **Degree in Biology** ( Biotechnology ) has provided me with a solid foundation in scientific methodologies and critical thinking.

Currently, I am pursuing the **Professional Certification Program in Data Science** from IBM, further enhancing my expertise in data analysis. This program has equipped me with a deep understanding of Python for Data Science, AI & Development, Tools for Data Science, Databases and SQL for Data Science with Python, and Data Analysis with Python. I am also in the process of completing courses in Data Visualization with Python, Applied Data Science Capstone, and Machine Learning with Python.

In my role as a Technical Manager at El Corte Inglés, in **Online Sales Division** , I have effectively managed technical issues and budgets. I have a proven track record of identifying and resolving database issues and Inconsistencies Between Systems. Leveraging tools such as SAP CRM, Salesforce, and IBM IMS, I have successfully contributed to the smooth operation of the online sales division. My experience in problem management and utilization of these tools has honed my ability to extract valuable insights from data.

In addition to my technical skills, I am also proficient in languages. I hold a **C1 level in English** of EOI and an *A2 level in German* of EOI. These language proficiencies enable me to effectively communicate and collaborate with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds.
